body_html: Your concern wakes me up. It is very reasonable and must be paid attention to handle with. The benchmark WIP. BTW， I notice that simd dispatcher could choose executing path according to the environment variables. The AVX512F will also follow the design rules. I think it is a good idea to let users to choose the appropriate environment variable to enable or disable the AVX512F.
body_text: Your concern wakes me up. It is very reasonable and must be paid attention to handle with. The benchmark WIP. BTW， I notice that simd dispatcher could choose executing path according to the environment variables. The AVX512F will also follow the design rules. I think it is a good idea to let users to choose the  appropriate environment variable to enable or disable the AVX512F.
body: Your concern wakes me up. It is very reasonable and must be paid attention to handle with. The benchmark WIP. BTW， I notice that [simd dispatcher](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/TH/generic/simd/simd.h#L130) could choose executing path according to the environment variables. The AVX512F will also follow the design rules. I think it is a good idea to let users to choose the  appropriate environment variable to enable or disable the AVX512F.
